headline: Tech Weekly Podcast: Dr Mark Smith on iPadio
text: This week on Tech Weekly Jemima Kiss, Guardian digital correspondent, meets CEO and fonder of iPadio Dr Mark Smith. Mark discusses the evolution of his communications application company and why a sports reports app turned out to be just as useful for NGO's in disaster zones as it was for paralympians at the 2012 games. And Jemima visits east London's Google Campus, where she meets some of the young entrepreneurs and talks to campus head Eze Vidra about the role of the campus in the education of the young emerging tech community.
